meta.content: Start here for the Gahanna Jefferson School District and all of our schools. Calendars, news, classroom portals and contact information for each school and department. Welcome!

link.title: Gahanna Jefferson Public School District Homepage

input.name: __EVENTVALIDATION

div.p: STAY UP TO DATE ON ALL THINGS GJPS

a.p: Stay informed with current and accurate GJPS information

div.p: Governor DeWine has announced the extended closure of our school buildings through Friday, May 1, 2020 at which time a re-evaluation will be made to see if our buildings can reopen. Gahanna-Jefferson Public Schools will continue to provide distance learning opportunities through this extended closure to our buildings.
If students are experiencing issues with a district provided device, please submit your information with GJPS Tech support or call (614) 479-1507.
Visit our Coronavirus | COVID-19 Updates page for the latest information from Gahanna-Jefferson Public Schools.

160 South Hamilton Road
Gahanna, Ohio 43230-2919
Phone: (614) 471-7065
Fax: (614) 478-5568
HOURS OF OPERATION

strong.span: GJPS Board of Education Student Learning & Achievement Committee Meeting
GJPS Board of Education Student Learning & Achievement Committee Meeting

div.span:
Description: The GJPS Board of Education will meet for a STUDENT LEARNING AND ACHIEVEMENT committee meeting at 6:30 p.m. on Tuesday, April 28, 2020.
In response to the Stay at Home Order issued by The Ohio Department of Health from Health Director Acton, the Gahanna-Jefferson Public Schools (GJPS) Board of Education will meet via video conferencing. Please join the meeting from your computer, tablet or smartphone at the following link:
http://www.gahannaschools.org/Board_of_Education/BEdMeetings.aspx

div.a: The Board of Education will meet via teleconferencing

strong.span: GJPS Board of Education Policy & Governance Meeting
GJPS Board of Education Policy & Governance Meeting

div.span:
Description:The GJPS Board of Education will meet for a POLICY & GOVERNANCE committee meeting at 6:30 p.m. on Thursday, April 30, 2020.
In response to the Stay at Home Order issued by The Ohio Department of Health from Health Director Acton, the Gahanna-Jefferson Public Schools (GJPS) Board of Education will meet via video conferencing. Please join the meeting from your computer, tablet or smartphone at the following link:
http://www.gahannaschools.org/Board_of_Education/BEdMeetings.aspx

div.a: The Board of Education will meet via teleconferencing

div.span: Join Superintendent Steve Barrett for coffee and conversation at the Panera Bread in the Clark Hall Center. Bring your questions or curiosity about all things GJPS.

div.a: Panera Bread, 91 N Hamilton Rd, Gahanna, OH 43230, USA

strong.span: GJPS Board of Education Finance Committee Meeting
GJPS Board of Education Finance Committee Meeting

div.span: The Gahanna-Jefferson Board of Education will meet for a regularly-scheduled finance committee meeting at 6:30 p.m. on the Tuesday directly before the monthly regular Board of Education meeting, at the Gahanna-Jefferson Public Schools Board of Education offices, 160 S. Hamilton Road, for the purpose of discussing district finances.

div.a: Gahanna-Jefferson Public Schools administrative office, 160 S Hamilton Rd, Gahanna, OH 43230, USA

div.span: For more information about The Gahanna-Jefferson Public Schools Board of Education, please visit https://tinyurl.com/gjpsBoardOfEd .

div.a: Clark Hall, 380 Granville Street, Gahanna, OH 43230.

img.alt: Image Link for April Grab & Go Meals

ul.li: Information about GJPS Board of Education live meetings broadcasted online. In response to the Stay at Home Order issued by The Ohio Department of Health from Health Director Acton, the Gahanna-Jefferson Public Schools (GJPS) Board of Education will meet via video conferencing.
Information about GJPS Grab and Go Lunch Program while our school buildings are closed.
Please complete the GJPS Free Lunch Request Form if you would like a district-provided free lunch for your GJPS PreK-12 students during the extended classroom learning closure.
Kindergarten Registration for the 2020-2021 School Year is now open. You may register online if your child will be 5-years old on or before August 1, 2020.
Registration for GJPS Summer School 2020 (Journey to Learning) has been postponed until noon on Friday, May 1, 2020. More information to follow.

Please consider donating to the GJPS FILL MY TUMMY FUND. This fund was created to feed our students an emergency plate lunch or breakfast when their limit to charge a school meal has been reached. More information about the GJPS Nutrition Department and our charge policy may be found here.
Families, please update/verify your information for the 2019-20 school year through Infinite Campus.

img.alt: Middle School South Teacher Explores Thailand

h3.a: Middle School South Teacher Explores Thailand

div.p: Enjoy the Thailand adventure of one Gahanna Middle School South teacher during the summer of 2019.
Mrs. Leffler's seventh grade students at Middle School South share their poetry about this unique time in history. Art contributions by Mr. Parker's seventh grade students.

h3.a: Fourth Grade Meteorologists at Chapelfield Elementary

div.p: Fourth Grade students at Chapelfield Elementary learn much through a Skype interview with Chief Meteorologist for ABC Good Morning America.
